mapper.insert: insert into agency_contact ( agency_id, contact_name, mobilePhone, address, city, location, latitude, longitude, create_time, update_time, id_del ) values ( #{agencyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), 0 )
